data.name: Overdraft
data.description: The overdraft facility allows the borrower to have a negative balance on the current account in the respective currency. The overdraft is an on-demand credit facility, designed to be used as a flexible borrowing for general working capital requirements.

lendingRates.additionalValue: AUD BLR rate used to price overdrafts. Any unauthorised overdrafts are charged an additional 2% above BLR rates.
